_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

description.en: Control your white label Zigbee devices made by Tuya

hint.en: Choose a light pattern and a speed for it. You can also choose what colors the pattern should have, this is not mandatory.

instruction.en: Push the F button on the Christmas Lights controller for aprox 5-10 seconds and release, lights should start to flash slowly.

desc.en: Make sure the curtain is fully closed before starting the calibration. Using physical buttons; Move the curtain to the the point where it should stop and then close it again. Push the Stop Calibration button when finished.
Finalized the calibration, please wait a minute before using the unit.

instruction.en: Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Two tiles will be created, one for each channel of the device. Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Insert a pin into the single hole on the side of the device and press it gently for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Press the button on the side of the unit for 5 seconds.

hint.en:
Set a value to compensate a temperature offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 0.1, 
default: 0 [°C]

Set a correction to compensate a humidity offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 1, 
default: 0 [%]
hint.nl:
Stel een correctiewaarde in om een Luchtvochtigheids verschil te compenseren.
Bereik: -10 - 10, stap grootte 1, 
standaard: 0 [%]

instruction.en: Open the backside of the unit and press the button inside for 5 seconds.

hint.en:
Set a value to compensate a temperature offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 0.1, 
default: 0 [°C]

Set a correction to compensate a humidity offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 1, 
default: 0 [%]
hint.nl:
Stel een correctiewaarde in om een Luchtvochtigheids verschil te compenseren.
Bereik: -10 - 10, stap grootte 1, 
standaard: 0 [%]

instruction.en: Push the setup button on the side of the device for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. If the pairing does not start, press the setup button again for 10-15 seconds until the led stops blinking and then try again.

hint.en: This setting determines the threshold before a battery alarm is given.

instruction.en: Press the reset button for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks.
Insert a pin into the single hole on the side of the device and press it gently for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Press the setup button for 10 seconds to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.

Insert a pin into the single hole on the side of the device and press it gently for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. If the pairing does not start, press the setup button again for 10-15 seconds until the led stops blinking and then try again.

hint.en: This setting determines the threshold before a battery alarm is given.

instruction.en: Insert a pin into the single hole on the side of the device and press it gently for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. If the pairing does not start, press the setup button again for 10-15 seconds until the led stops blinking and then try again.

hint.en: This setting determines the threshold before a battery alarm is given.

instruction.en: Push a pin gently into the reset hole on the backside of the unit for aprox 10 seconds until the led on the front blinks rapidly.
Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.

hint.en:
Set a value to compensate if you experience that the Metered Power is not correct.
Range: 0.8 - 1.2, step size 0.1, 
default: 1

Set a value to compensate if you experience that the Measured Power is not correct.
Range: 0.8 - 1.2, step size 0.1, 
default: 1

instruction.en: A tile for each socket will be created. Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
A tile for each socket will be created. Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
A tile for each socket will be created. Press and hold down on/off switch for aprox 5 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Two tiles will be created, one for each channel of the device. Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Insert a pin into the single hole on the side of the device and press it gently for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.

hint.en:
Set a value to compensate a temperature offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 0.1, 
default: 0 [°C]

Set a correction to compensate a humidity offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 1, 
default: 0 [%]
hint.nl:
Stel een correctiewaarde in om een Luchtvochtigheids verschil te compenseren.
Bereik: -10 - 10, stap grootte 1, 
standaard: 0 [%]

instruction.en: Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Power on to enter pairing mode.
Press the setup button for 10 seconds or switch the unit on and off five times to enter pairing mode (the LED should blink green).
Press the button for aprox 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
Press the left button for aprox 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking). A tile for each button will be created.
Press the left button for aprox 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
Press the lower left button for aprox 10 seconds (all LED should start blinking).
Press the button for 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
A tile for each button will be created. Remove the front and press the setup button for 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
A tile for each button will be created. Remove the front and press the setup button for 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
Push the button for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. If nothing happens; put two fingers against the detectors and repeat.
Put the device in a USB slot and let it power up.
